ygData.subject: Re: Obsidian Shard minor spoiler
ygData.msgSnippet: **Spoiler warning*** Not a huge deal tho =) The shard is dropped by the Kobold Predator in Solusek A. It s hard to describe where he is located, but I can tell
ygData.messageBody:
**Spoiler warning*** Not a huge deal tho =)















The shard is dropped by the Kobold Predator in Solusek A. It's hard to
describe where he is located, but I can tell you he roams a short corridor
above the Foreman's room. There is a goblin placeholder there most of the
time. The corridor has a door that leads to a room with stairs. Down the
stairs and back around to the right leads to the Foreman's room.

Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Quellious of the 50th Chorus
Veeshan

>Who drops the Obsidian Shard? Where and how often does it spawn happen? is
>it a rare spawn? What level is the NPC that drops it? etc? etc?>Unrelated
>question: What songs/tactics does anyone recommend for
>
Unrest?
>I've never been there, and a group around my level from my guild are going
>and want me to come too - and I'd rather be prepared than not... as for
>thinking about it from my standpoint: I have every song a L22 bard could
>own, the standard bard instruments, and my weapons are a Tentacle Whip and
>a
>Water Crystal Staff (just got that last nite, thanks to my guilds high
>level
>Cleric hanging out to help). Anyway, suggestions would be greatly
>appreciated!
>
>Safe Journeys!
>
>==Lady Brangwen Incantare of the 22nd Song
>====The Lavender-Eyed Lady of Song
>======Squire Court of The Guild New Outriders
>========Citizen of the City of Kelethin on Faydwer
>=========Wife of High Elf Enchanter, Callais Incantare
>===========Server: The Rathe
>===============================================
